name: I. “FAME AND HISTORY”
description:
1/4 from the “REVIVAL” collection.
REVIVAL is a NFT collection that was born with the purpose of reviving important portions of art history that were silenced and deteriorated by the passage of time.
An alchemical process that connects with spirits that left the earthly plane in past times.

Description of the piece:
On a field of ruins, Fame in the air. In the foreground, a sarcophagus with inscriptions in Greek and Latin, and on it, books, a skull and a vase. Beside, Virtue under a winged hourglass, reading the book of History. All around, symbols of rebirth: ears of corn, Phoenixes and a deer breaking its horns.
- Goltzius, Hendrik. 1586.

AS ABOVE, SO BELOW.

1535x2000px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/revival
